column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Kaliyah - Thank you for the great review. I'm glad you and your friends enjoyed your stay with us. If you enjoyed our Vegetable Soup Ramen
column2: I would also recommend our Spicy Vegan Ramen. It's definitely a crowd favorite. We appreciate your business and your kind words
column3: and we hope to see you and your friends here again soon!
